english.segment1: Thinking back on summer weekends. Hanging out no need for reasons. I recall spot drive-in meetings. 3 a.m. and still we're eating
english.segment2: I make this promise and I'll keep it. Never will my friends I forfeit. To all the ones who feel forgotten. Keep holding on to these words just said
english.segment3: I understand and I don't blame you. I've been gone and you've been gone too. Different place, so many places. Growing up just seems to haveve changed things
english.segment4: I make this promise and I'll keep it. Never will my friends I forfeit. To all the ones who feel forgotten. Keep holding on to these words just said
english.segment5: I make this promise and I'll keep it. Never will my friends I forfeit. To all the ones who feel forgotten. Keep holding on to these words just said
english.segment6: This promise and I'll keep it. Never will my, never will my. Never will my friends I forfeit
